eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs

Packages that use eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs
Package
Description
eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs
 
  • Classes in eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs used by eu.clarin.sru.client.fcs
    Class
    Description
    ClarinFCSClientBuilder
    A class that implements the builder pattern for creating SRU client instances that are configured to be used for CLARIN-FCS.
    ClarinFCSEndpointDescription.DataView
    This class implements a description of a data view supported by the endpoint.
    ClarinFCSEndpointDescription.DataView.DeliveryPolicy
    Enumeration to indicate the delivery policy of a data view.
    ClarinFCSEndpointDescription.Layer
    This class implements a description of supported layers for resources by the endpoint.
    ClarinFCSEndpointDescription.Layer.ContentEncoding
    Enumeration to indicate the content encoding of a layer.
    ClarinFCSEndpointDescription.LexField
    This class implements a description of supported fields for lexical resources by the endpoint.
    ClarinFCSEndpointDescription.ResourceInfo
    This class implements a description of a resource available at an endpoint.
    ClarinFCSEndpointDescription.ResourceInfo.AvailabilityRestriction
    Enumeration to indicate the content encoding of a layer.
    DataView
    Base class for Data View implementations according to the CLARIN-FCS record schema.
    DataViewAdvanced.Layer
     
    DataViewAdvanced.Segment
     
    DataViewAdvanced.Span
     
    DataViewAdvanced.Unit
     
    DataViewHits
    A Data View implementation that stores the content of a HITS Data View.
    DataViewLex.Field
    Container class for <Field/> data.
    DataViewLex.FieldType
    All valid type values for the <Field/> element of an Lex Data View <Entry/>.
    DataViewLex.Value
    Container class for <Value/> data.
    DataViewLex.VirtualFieldType
    All valid virtual type values for the <Entry/> element of an Lex Data View.
    DataViewParser
    Base class for implementing parsers for parsing a specific Data View embedded in a CLARIN-FCS record.
    Resource
    A CLARIN-FCS resource
    Resource.ResourceFragment
    A CLARIN-FCS resource fragment
